commit.message:
Add Docker build and push to release stage of build (#1001)

* Add Docker build and push to release stage of build

* Fix typo in Jenkinsfile

* Add docs for Docker build and correct whitespace issues

* Typo

* Typo

* Quotes for secret

* Typo

* Update scripts/jenkins/build_docker.sh

Co-Authored-By: Ivan Fernandez Calvo <kuisathaverat@users.noreply.github.com>

* Update scripts/jenkins/build_docker.sh

Co-Authored-By: Ivan Fernandez Calvo <kuisathaverat@users.noreply.github.com>

* Update scripts/jenkins/build_docker.sh

Co-Authored-By: Ivan Fernandez Calvo <kuisathaverat@users.noreply.github.com>

* Update scripts/jenkins/push_docker.sh

Co-Authored-By: Ivan Fernandez Calvo <kuisathaverat@users.noreply.github.com>

* Update scripts/jenkins/build_docker.sh

Co-Authored-By: Victor Martinez <victormartinezrubio@gmail.com>

* Update scripts/jenkins/build_docker.sh

Co-Authored-By: Victor Martinez <victormartinezrubio@gmail.com>

* Update scripts/jenkins/push_docker.sh

Co-Authored-By: Victor Martinez <victormartinezrubio@gmail.com>

* Update scripts/jenkins/push_docker.sh

Co-Authored-By: Victor Martinez <victormartinezrubio@gmail.com>

* Review suggestion to remove documentation for this for now

* Implement retry for Docker push when running in CI

* Change name of stage per review comment

* Pin to SHA hash for Alpine 3.9

* Make Sonatype optional with env flag

* Fix typo

* Better handling for image checking

* Swing over to observability namespace

* Get tag name from Jenkins if possible

* Remove commented line that is no longer needed

* Update scripts/jenkins/build_docker.sh

Co-Authored-By: Victor Martinez <victormartinezrubio@gmail.com>

* Update scripts/jenkins/build_docker.sh

Co-Authored-By: Victor Martinez <victormartinezrubio@gmail.com>

* Check for all jars and style change for Docker build

* Use same git tag lookup strategy between scripts

Co-authored-by: Ivan Fernandez Calvo <kuisathaverat@users.noreply.github.com>
Co-authored-by: Victor Martinez <victormartinezrubio@gmail.com>
